H0.text: who became the king of ayodhya after ram. Luv

H1.text: who became the king of ayodhya after ram. Bharata

H2.text: who became the king of ayodhya after ram. Shatrughna

H3.text: who became the king of ayodhya after ram. Kusha

A4.text: Placing the sandals on the throne to represent Rama, Bharata assumed the regency of Kosala for fourteen years, the kingdom administered from the village.

A5.text: Under duress, Dashratha named Bharata as his heir, and banished Rama from his kingdom for a period of fourteen years.

A6.text: Bharata ruled Ayodhya from Nandigram and was an excellent leader

A7.text: Valmiki trained Lava and Kusha in archery and succeeded to the throne after Rama.

A8.text: Bharata reluctantly returns to AyodhyƒÅ and rules the kingdom on behalf of his brother.
